text: @realDonaldTrump Your slow response to COVID-19 had bankrupted this country, like you did with serveral of your companies that were bought and paid for by Daddy. This time it is on the taxpayer to bail you and our country out.  The honorable thing for you to do is to bow out of the 2020 election.
